text: لَوْ أَرَدْنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ لَهْوًا لَّٱتَّخَذْنَـٰهُ مِن لَّدُنَّآ إِن كُنَّا فَـٰعِلِينَ

translation.en.sahih: Had We intended to take a diversion, We could have taken it from [what is] with Us - if [indeed] We were to do so.
translation.id.indonesian: Sekiranya Kami hendak membuat sesuatu permainan, (isteri dan anak), tentulah Kami membuatnya dari sisi Kami. Jika Kami menghendaki berbuat demikian, (tentulah Kami telah melakukannya).
